   20: 
   21: -module(trace_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: %%%
   24: %%% Tests the trace BIF.
   25: %%%
   26: 
   27: -export([all/0, suite/0, groups/0,
   28:          init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   29:          init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   30:          init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   31:          link_receive_call_correlation/0,
   32:          receive_trace/1, link_receive_call_correlation/1, self_send/1,
   33: 	 timeout_trace/1, send_trace/1,
   34: 	 procs_trace/1, dist_procs_trace/1, procs_new_trace/1,
   35: 	 suspend/1, suspend_exit/1, suspender_exit/1,
   36: 	 suspend_system_limit/1, suspend_opts/1, suspend_waiting/1,
   37: 	 new_clear/1, existing_clear/1, tracer_die/1,
   38: 	 set_on_spawn/1, set_on_first_spawn/1, cpu_timestamp/1,
   39: 	 set_on_link/1, set_on_first_link/1,
   40: 	 system_monitor_args/1, more_system_monitor_args/1,
   41: 	 system_monitor_long_gc_1/1, system_monitor_long_gc_2/1, 
   42: 	 system_monitor_large_heap_1/1, system_monitor_large_heap_2/1,
   43: 	 system_monitor_long_schedule/1, system_monitor_long_message_queue/1,
   44:          system_monitor_long_message_queue_ignore/1,
   45: 	 bad_flag/1, trace_delivered/1, trap_exit_self_receive/1,
   46:          trace_info_badarg/1, erl_704/1, ms_excessive_nesting/1]).
   47: 
   48: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   49: 
   50: %%% Internal exports
   51: -export([process/1]).
   52: 
   53: -undef(line).
   54: -define(line, erlang:display(?LINE)).
   55: 
   56: suite() ->
   57:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   58:      {timetrap, {minutes, 1}}].
   59: 
   60: all() ->
   61:     trace_sessions:all().
   62: 
   63: groups() ->
   64:     trace_sessions:groups(testcases()).
   65: 
   66: testcases() ->
   67:     [cpu_timestamp, receive_trace, link_receive_call_correlation,
   68:      self_send, timeout_trace,
   69:      send_trace, procs_trace, dist_procs_trace, suspend,
   70:      suspend_exit, suspender_exit,
   71:      suspend_system_limit, suspend_opts, suspend_waiting,
   72:      new_clear, existing_clear, tracer_die, set_on_spawn,
   73:      set_on_first_spawn, set_on_link, set_on_first_link,
   74:      system_monitor_args,
   75:      more_system_monitor_args, system_monitor_long_gc_1,
   76:      system_monitor_long_gc_2, system_monitor_large_heap_1,
   77:      system_monitor_long_schedule,
   78:      system_monitor_large_heap_2, system_monitor_long_message_queue,
   79:      system_monitor_long_message_queue_ignore,
   80:      bad_flag, trace_delivered,
   81:      trap_exit_self_receive, trace_info_badarg, erl_704,
   82:      ms_excessive_nesting].
   83: 
   84: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   85:     trace_sessions:init_per_suite(Config).
   86: 
   87: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   88:     trace_sessions:end_per_suite(Config).
   89: 
   90: 
   91: init_per_group(Group, Config) ->
   92:     trace_sessions:init_per_group(Group, Config).
   93: 
   94: end_per_group(Group, Config) ->
   95:     trace_sessions:end_per_group(Group, Config).
   96: 
   97: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config0) ->
   98:     Config1 = [{receiver,spawn(fun receiver/0)}|Config0],
   99:     trace_sessions:init_per_testcase(Config1).
  100: 
  101: end_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
  102:     Receiver = proplists:get_value(receiver, Config),
  103:     unlink(Receiver),
  104:     exit(Receiver, die),
  105: 
  106:     (erts_test_utils:ept_check_leaked_nodes(Config)
  107:      andalso
  108:      trace_sessions:end_per_testcase(Config)).
  109: 
  110: erlang_trace(A,B,C) ->
  111:     trace_sessions:erlang_trace(A,B,C).
  112: 
  113: erlang_trace_pattern(A,B,C) ->
  114:     trace_sessions:erlang_trace_pattern(A,B,C).
  115: 
  116: erlang_trace_info(A,B) ->
  117:     trace_sessions:erlang_trace_info(A,B).
  118: 
  119: %% No longer testing anything, just reporting whether cpu_timestamp
  120: %% is enabled or not.
  121: cpu_timestamp(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  122:     %% Test whether cpu_timestamp is implemented on this platform.
  123:     Works = try erlang_trace(all, true, [cpu_timestamp]) of
  124:                 _ ->
  125:                     erlang_trace(all, false, [cpu_timestamp]),
  126:                     true
  127:             catch
  128:                 error:badarg -> false
  129:             end,
  130:     {comment,case Works of
  131:                  false -> "cpu_timestamp is NOT implemented/does not work";
  132:                  true -> "cpu_timestamp works"
  133:              end}.
  134: 
  135: 
  136: %% Tests that trace(Pid, How, ['receive']) works.
  137: 
  138: receive_trace(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  139:     Receiver = proplists:get_value(receiver, Config),
  140: 
  141:     %% Trace the process; make sure that we receive the trace messages.
  142:     1 = erlang_trace(Receiver, true, ['receive']),
  143:     Hello = {hello, world},
  144:     Receiver ! Hello,
  145:     {trace, Receiver, 'receive', Hello} = receive_first_trace(),
  146:     Hello2 = {hello, again, world},
  147:     Receiver ! Hello2,
  148:     {trace, Receiver, 'receive', Hello2} = receive_first_trace(),
  149:     receive_nothing(),
  150: 
  151:     %% Test 'receive' with matchspec
  152:     F1 = fun ({Pat, IsMatching}) ->
  153: 		 set_trace_pattern('receive', Pat, []),
  154: 		 Receiver ! Hello,
  155: 		 case IsMatching of
  156: 		     true ->
  157: 			 {trace, Receiver, 'receive', Hello} = receive_first_trace();
  158: 		     false ->
  159: 			 ok
  160: 		 end,
  161: 		 receive_nothing()
  162: 	 end,
  163:     From = self(),
  164:     Node = node(),
  165:     lists:foreach(F1, [{no, true},
  166: 		       {[{[Node, undefined,"Unexpected"],[],[]}], false},
  167: 		       {[{[Node, From,'_'],[],[]}], true},
  168: 		       {[{[Node, '$1','_'],[{'=/=','$1',From}],[]}], false},
  169: 		       {[{['$1', '_','_'],[{'=:=','$1',Node}],[]}], true},
  170: 		       {false, false},
  171: 		       {true, true}]),
  172: 
  173:     %% Remote messages
  174:     {ok, Peer, OtherNode} = ?CT_PEER(),
  175:     RemoteProc = spawn_link(OtherNode, ?MODULE, process, [self()]),
  176:     io:format("RemoteProc = ~p ~n", [RemoteProc]),
  177: 
  178:     RemoteProc ! {send_please, Receiver, Hello},
  179:     {trace, Receiver, 'receive', Hello} = receive_first_trace(),
  180:     RemoteProc ! {send_please, Receiver, 99},
  181:     {trace, Receiver, 'receive', 99} = receive_first_trace(),
  182: 
  183:     %% Remote with matchspec
  184:     F2 = fun (To, {Pat, IsMatching}) ->
  185: 		 set_trace_pattern('receive', Pat, []),
  186: 		 RemoteProc ! {send_please, To, Hello},
  187: 		 case IsMatching of
  188: 		     true ->
  189: 			 {trace, Receiver, 'receive', Hello} = receive_first_trace();
  190: 		     false ->
  191: 			 ok
  192: 		 end,
  193: 		 receive_nothing()
  194: 	 end,
  195:     F2(Receiver, {no, true}),
  196:     F2(Receiver, {[{[OtherNode, undefined,"Unexpected"],[],[]}], false}),
  197:     F2(Receiver, {[{[OtherNode, RemoteProc,'_'],[],[]},
  198: 		   {[OtherNode, undefined,'_'],[],[]}], true}),
  199:     F2(Receiver, {[{[OtherNode, '$1','_'],
  200: 		    [{'orelse',{'=:=','$1',undefined},{'=/=',{node,'$1'},{node}}}],
  201: 		    []}], true}),
  202:     F2(Receiver, {[{['$1', '_','_'], [{'=:=','$1',OtherNode}], []}], true}),
  203:     F2(Receiver, {false, false}),
  204:     F2(Receiver, {true, true}),
  205: 
  206:     %% Remote to named with matchspec
  207:     Name = trace_SUITE_receiver,
  208:     register(Name, Receiver),
  209:     NN = {Name, node()},
  210:     F2(NN, {no, true}),
  211:     F2(NN, {[{[OtherNode, undefined,"Unexpected"],[],[]}], false}),
  212:     F2(NN, {[{[OtherNode, RemoteProc,'_'],[],[]},
  213: 	     {[OtherNode, undefined,'_'],[],[]}], true}),
  214:     F2(NN, {[{[OtherNode, '$1','_'],
  215: 	      [{'orelse',{'=:=','$1',undefined},{'=/=',{node,'$1'},{node}}}],
  216: 	      []}], true}),
  217:     F2(NN, {[{['$1', '_','_'], [{'==','$1',OtherNode}], []}], true}),
  218:     F2(NN, {false, false}),
  219:     F2(NN, {true, true}),
  220: 
  221:     unlink(RemoteProc),
  222:     peer:stop(Peer),
  223: 
  224:     %% Timeout
  225:     Receiver ! {set_timeout, 10},
  226:     {trace, Receiver, 'receive', {set_timeout, 10}} = receive_first_trace(),
  227:     {trace, Receiver, 'receive', timeout} = receive_first_trace(),
  228:     erlang_trace_pattern('receive', [{[clock_service,undefined,timeout], [], []}], []),
  229:     Receiver ! {set_timeout, 7},
  230:     {trace, Receiver, 'receive', timeout} = receive_first_trace(),
  231:     erlang_trace_pattern('receive', true, []),
  232: 
  233:     %% Another process should not be able to trace Receiver.
  234:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  235:     Intruder = fun_spawn(fun() -> erlang_trace(Receiver, true, ['receive']) end),
  236:     {'EXIT', Intruder, {badarg, _}} = receive_first(),
  237: 
  238:     %% Untrace the process; we should not receive anything.
  239:     1 = erlang_trace(Receiver, false, ['receive']),
  240:     Receiver ! {hello, there},
  241:     Receiver ! any_garbage,
  242:     receive_nothing(),
  243: 
  244:     %% Verify restrictions in matchspec for 'receive'
  245:     F3 = fun (Pat) -> {'EXIT', {badarg,_}} = (catch erlang_trace_pattern('receive', Pat, [])) end,
  246:     WC = ['_','_','_'],
  247:     F3([{WC,[],[{message, {process_dump}}]}]),
  248:     F3([{WC,[{is_seq_trace}],[]}]),
  249:     F3([{WC,[],[{set_seq_token,label,4711}]}]),
  250:     F3([{WC,[],[{get_seq_token}]}]),
  251:     F3([{WC,[],[{enable_trace,call}]}]),
  252:     F3([{WC,[],[{enable_trace,self(),call}]}]),
  253:     F3([{WC,[],[{disable_trace,call}]}]),
  254:     F3([{WC,[],[{disable_trace,self(),call}]}]),
  255:     F3([{WC,[],[{trace,[call],[]}]}]),
  256:     F3([{WC,[],[{trace,self(),[],[call]}]}]),
  257:     F3([{WC,[],[{caller}]}]),
  258:     F3([{WC,[],[{silent,true}]}]),
  259: 
  260:     ok.
  261: 
  262: %% Tests that receive of a message always happens before a call with
  263: %% that message and that links/unlinks are ordered together with the
  264: %% 'receive'.
  265: link_receive_call_correlation() ->
  266:     [{timetrap, {minutes, 5}}].
  267: link_receive_call_correlation(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  268:     Receiver = fun_spawn(fun F() ->
  269:                                  receive
  270:                                      stop -> ok;
  271:                                      M -> receive_msg(M), F()
  272:                                  end
  273:                          end),
  274:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  275: 
  276:     %% Trace the process; make sure that we receive the trace messages.
  277:     1 = erlang_trace(Receiver, true, ['receive', procs, call, timestamp, scheduler_id]),
  278:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE, receive_msg, '_'}, [], [local]),
  279: 
  280:     Num = 100,
  281: 
  282:     (fun F(0) -> [];
  283:          F(N) ->
  284:              if N rem 2 == 0 ->
  285:                      link(Receiver);
  286:                 true ->
  287:                      unlink(Receiver)
  288:              end,
  289:              [Receiver ! N | F(N-1)]
  290:      end)(Num),
  291: 
  292:     Receiver ! stop,
  293:     MonRef = erlang:monitor(process, Receiver),
  294:     receive {'DOWN', MonRef, _, _, _} -> ok end,
  295:     Ref = erlang:trace_delivered(Receiver),
  296:     receive {trace_delivered, _, Ref} -> ok end,
  297: 
  298:     Msgs = (fun F() -> receive M -> [M | F()] after 1 -> [] end end)(),
  299: 
  300:     case check_consistent(Receiver, Num, Num, Num, Msgs, false, undefined) of
  301:         ok ->
  302:             ok;
  303:         {error, Reason} ->
  304:             ct:log("~p", [Msgs]),
  305:             ct:fail({error, Reason})
  306:     end.
  307: 
  308: -define(schedid, , _).
  309: 
  310: check_consistent(_Pid, Recv, Call, _LU, [Msg | _], _Received, _LinkedN) when Recv > Call ->
  311:     {error, Msg};
  312: check_consistent(Pid, Recv, Call, LU, [Msg | Msgs], false, undefined) ->
  313: 
  314:     case Msg of
  315:         {trace, Pid, 'receive', Recv ?schedid} ->
  316:             check_consistent(Pid,Recv - 1, Call, LU, Msgs, true, undefined);
  317:         {trace_ts, Pid, 'receive', Recv ?schedid, _} ->
  318:             check_consistent(Pid,Recv - 1, Call, LU, Msgs, true, undefined);
  319: 
  320:         {trace, Pid, call, {?MODULE, receive_msg, [Call]} ?schedid} ->
  321:             check_consistent(Pid,Recv, Call - 1, LU, Msgs, false, undefined);
  322:         {trace_ts, Pid, call, {?MODULE, receive_msg, [Call]} ?schedid, _} ->
  323:             check_consistent(Pid,Recv, Call - 1, LU, Msgs, false, undefined);
  324: 
  325:         {trace, Pid, _, _Self ?schedid} ->
  326:             check_consistent(Pid, Recv, Call, LU, Msgs, false, undefined);
  327:         {trace_ts, Pid, _, _Self ?schedid, _} ->
  328:             check_consistent(Pid, Recv, Call, LU, Msgs, false, undefined);
  329: 
  330:         Msg ->
  331:             {error, Msg}
  332:     end;
  333: check_consistent(Pid, Recv, Call, LU, [Msg | Msgs], true, undefined) ->
  334: 
  335:     case Msg of
  336:         {trace, Pid, call, {?MODULE, receive_msg, [Call]} ?schedid} ->
  337:             check_consistent(Pid,Recv, Call - 1, LU, Msgs, true, undefined);
  338:         {trace_ts, Pid, call, {?MODULE, receive_msg, [Call]} ?schedid, _} ->
  339:             check_consistent(Pid,Recv, Call - 1, LU, Msgs, true, undefined);
  340: 
  341:         {trace, Pid, getting_linked, _Self ?schedid} ->
  342:             check_consistent(Pid, Recv, Call, LU - 1, Msgs, true, Recv rem 2);
  343:         {trace_ts, Pid, getting_linked, _Self ?schedid, _} ->
  344:             check_consistent(Pid, Recv, Call, LU - 1, Msgs, true, Recv rem 2);
  345: 
  346:         {trace, Pid, getting_unlinked, _Self ?schedid} ->
  347:             check_consistent(Pid, Recv, Call, LU - 1, Msgs, true, (Recv+1) rem 2);
  348:         {trace_ts, Pid, getting_unlinked, _Self ?schedid, _} ->
  349:             check_consistent(Pid, Recv, Call, LU - 1, Msgs, true, (Recv+1) rem 2);
  350: 
  351:         Msg ->
  352:             {error, Msg}
  353:     end;
  354: check_consistent(Pid, Recv, Call, LU, [Msg | Msgs], true, LinkedN) ->
  355:     UnlinkedN = (LinkedN + 1) rem 2,
  356: 
  357:     case Msg of
  358:         {trace, Pid, 'receive', Recv ?schedid} when Recv == LU ->
  359:             check_consistent(Pid,Recv - 1, Call, LU, Msgs, true, LinkedN);
  360:         {trace_ts, Pid, 'receive', Recv ?schedid, _} when Recv == LU ->
  361:             check_consistent(Pid,Recv - 1, Call, LU, Msgs, true, LinkedN);
  362: 
  363:         {trace, Pid, call, {?MODULE, receive_msg, [Call]} ?schedid} ->
  364:             check_consistent(Pid,Recv, Call - 1, LU, Msgs, true, LinkedN);
  365:         {trace_ts, Pid, call, {?MODULE, receive_msg, [Call]} ?schedid, _} ->
  366:             check_consistent(Pid,Recv, Call - 1, LU, Msgs, true, LinkedN);
  367: 
  368:         %% We check that for each receive we have gotten a
  369:         %% getting_linked or getting_unlinked message. Also
  370:         %% if we receive a getting_linked, then the next
  371:         %% message we expect to receive is an even number
  372:         %% and odd number for getting_unlinked.
  373:         {trace, Pid, getting_linked, _Self ?schedid}
  374:           when Recv rem 2 == LinkedN ->
  375:             check_consistent(Pid, Recv, Call, LU - 1, Msgs, true, LinkedN);
  376:         {trace_ts, Pid, getting_linked, _Self ?schedid, _}
  377:           when Recv rem 2 == LinkedN ->
  378:             check_consistent(Pid, Recv, Call, LU - 1, Msgs, true, LinkedN);
  379: 
  380:         {trace, Pid, getting_unlinked, _Self ?schedid}
  381:           when Recv rem 2 == UnlinkedN ->
  382:             check_consistent(Pid, Recv, Call, LU - 1, Msgs, true, LinkedN);
  383:         {trace_ts, Pid, getting_unlinked, _Self ?schedid, _}
  384:           when Recv rem 2 == UnlinkedN ->
  385:             check_consistent(Pid, Recv, Call, LU - 1, Msgs, true, LinkedN);
  386: 
  387:         {trace,Pid,'receive',Ignore ?schedid}
  388:           when Ignore == stop; Ignore == timeout ->
  389:             check_consistent(Pid, Recv, Call, LU, Msgs, true, LinkedN);
  390:         {trace_ts,Pid,'receive',Ignore ?schedid,_}
  391:           when Ignore == stop; Ignore == timeout ->
  392:             check_consistent(Pid, Recv, Call, LU, Msgs, true, LinkedN);
  393: 
  394:         {trace, Pid, exit, normal ?schedid} ->
  395:             check_consistent(Pid, Recv, Call, LU, Msgs, true, LinkedN);
  396:         {trace_ts, Pid, exit, normal  ?schedid, _} ->
  397:             check_consistent(Pid, Recv, Call, LU, Msgs, true, LinkedN);
  398:         {'EXIT', Pid, normal} ->
  399:             check_consistent(Pid, Recv, Call, LU, Msgs, true, LinkedN);
  400:         Msg ->
  401:             {error, Msg}
  402:     end;
  403: check_consistent(_, 0, 0, 1, [], true, _) ->
  404:     ok;
  405: check_consistent(_, Recv, Call, LU, [], _, _) ->
  406:     {error,{Recv, Call, LU}}.
  407: 
  408: receive_msg(M) ->
  409:     M.
  410: 
  411: %% Test that traces are generated for messages sent
  412: %% and received to/from self().
  413: self_send(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  414:     Fun =
  415:     fun(Self, Parent) -> receive
  416:                              go_ahead ->
  417:                                  self() ! from_myself,
  418:                                  Self(Self, Parent);
  419:                              from_myself ->
  420:                                  Parent ! done
  421:                          end
  422:     end,
  423:     Self = self(),
  424:     SelfSender = fun_spawn(Fun, [Fun, Self]),
  425:     erlang_trace(SelfSender, true, ['receive', 'send']),
  426:     SelfSender ! go_ahead,
  427:     receive {trace, SelfSender, 'receive', go_ahead} -> ok end,
  428:     receive {trace, SelfSender, 'receive', from_myself} -> ok end,
  429:     receive
  430:         {trace,SelfSender,send,from_myself,SelfSender} -> ok
  431:     end,
  432:     receive {trace,SelfSender,send,done,Self} -> ok end,
  433:     receive done -> ok end,
  434:     ok.
  435: 
  436: %% Test that we can receive timeout traces.
  437: timeout_trace(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  438:     Process = fun_spawn(fun process/0),
  439:     1 = erlang_trace(Process, true, ['receive']),
  440:     Process ! timeout_please,
  441:     {trace, Process, 'receive', timeout_please} = receive_first_trace(),
  442:     {trace, Process, 'receive', timeout} = receive_first_trace(),
  443:     receive_nothing(),
  444:     ok.
  445: 
  446: %% Tests that trace(Pid, How, [send]) works.
  447: 
  448: send_trace(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  449:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  450:     Sender = fun_spawn(fun sender/0),
  451:     Receiver = proplists:get_value(receiver, Config),
  452: 
  453:     %% Check that a message sent to another process is traced.
  454:     1 = erlang_trace(Sender, true, [send]),
  455:     F1 = fun (Pat) ->
  456: 		 set_trace_pattern(send, Pat, []),
  457: 		 Sender ! {send_please, Receiver, to_receiver},
  458: 		 {trace, Sender, send, to_receiver, Receiver} = receive_first_trace(),
  459: 		 receive_nothing()
  460: 	 end,
  461:     lists:foreach(F1, [no,
  462: 		       [{[Receiver,to_receiver],[],[]}],
  463: 		       [{['_','_'],[],[]}],
  464: 		       [{['$1','_'],[{is_pid,'$1'}],[]}],
  465: 		       [{['_','$1'],[{is_atom,'$1'}],[]}],
  466: 		       true]),
  467: 
  468:     %% Test {message, Msg}
  469:     F1m = fun ({Pat, Msg}) ->
  470: 		 set_trace_pattern(send, Pat, []),
  471: 		 Sender ! {send_please, Receiver, to_receiver},
  472: 		 {trace, Sender, send, to_receiver, Receiver, Msg} = receive_first_trace(),
  473: 		 receive_nothing()
  474: 	 end,
  475:     lists:foreach(F1m, [{[{['_','_'],[],[{message, 4711}]}], 4711},
  476: 			{[{['_','_'],[],[{message, "4711"}]}], "4711"}
  477: 		       ]),
  478: 
  479:     %% Test {message, {process_dump}}
  480:     set_trace_pattern(send, [{['_','_'],[],[{message, {process_dump}}]}], []),
  481:     Sender ! {send_please, Receiver, to_receiver},
  482:     {trace, Sender, send, to_receiver, Receiver, ProcDump} = receive_first_trace(),
  483:     true = is_binary(ProcDump),
  484:     receive_nothing(),
  485: 
  486:     %% Same test with false match spec
  487:     F2 = fun (Pat) ->
  488: 		 set_trace_pattern(send, Pat, []),
  489: 		 Sender ! {send_please, Receiver, to_receiver},
  490: 		 receive_nothing()
  491: 	 end,
  492:     lists:foreach(F2, [[{[Sender,to_receiver],[],[]}],
  493: 		       [{[Receiver,nomatch],[],[]}],
  494: 		       [{['$1','_'],[{is_atom,'$1'}],[]}],
  495: 		       [{['_','$1'],[{is_pid,'$1'}],[]}],
  496: 		       false,
  497: 		       [{['_','_'],[],[{message,false}]}],
  498: 		       [{['_','_'],[],[{silent,true}]}]]),
  499:     erlang_trace_pattern(send, true, []),
  500:     erlang_trace(Sender, false, [silent]),
  501: 
  502:     %% Check that a message sent to another registered process is traced.
  503:     register(?MODULE,Receiver),
  504:     F3 = fun (Pat) ->
  505: 		 set_trace_pattern(send, Pat, []),
  506: 		 Sender ! {send_please, ?MODULE, to_receiver},
  507: 		 {trace, Sender, send, to_receiver, ?MODULE} = receive_first_trace(),
  508: 		 receive_nothing()
  509: 	 end,
  510:     lists:foreach(F3, [no,
  511: 		       [{[?MODULE,to_receiver],[],[]}],
  512: 		       [{['_','_'],[],[]}],
  513: 		       [{['$1','_'],[{is_atom,'$1'}],[]}],
  514: 		       [{['_','$1'],[{is_atom,'$1'}],[]}],
  515: 		       true]),
  516:     %% Again with false match spec
  517:     F4 = fun (Pat) ->
  518: 		 set_trace_pattern(send, Pat, []),
  519: 		 Sender ! {send_please, ?MODULE, to_receiver},
  520: 		 receive_nothing()
  521: 	 end,
  522:     lists:foreach(F4, [[{[nomatch,to_receiver],[],[]}],
  523: 		       [{[?MODULE,nomatch],[],[]}],
  524: 		       [{['$1','_'],[{is_pid,'$1'}],[]}],
  525: 		       [{['_','$1'],[{is_pid,'$1'}],[]}],
  526: 		       [{['_','_'],[],[{message,false}]}],
  527: 		       [{['_','_'],[],[{silent,true}]}]
  528: 		      ]),
  529:     unregister(?MODULE),
  530:     erlang_trace_pattern(send, true, []),
  531:     erlang_trace(Sender, false, [silent]),
  532: 
  533:     %% Check that a message sent to this process is traced.
  534:     F5 = fun (Pat) ->
  535: 		 set_trace_pattern(send, Pat, []),
  536: 		 Sender ! {send_please, self(), to_myself},
  537: 		 receive to_myself -> ok end,
  538: 		 Self = self(),
  539: 		 {trace, Sender, send, to_myself, Self} = receive_first_trace(),
  540: 		 receive_nothing()
  541: 	 end,
  542:     lists:foreach(F5, [no,
  543: 		       [{[self(),to_myself],[],[]}],
  544: 		       [{['_','_'],[],[]}],
  545: 		       true]),
  546: 
  547:     %% Check that a message sent to dead process is traced.
  548:     {Pid,Ref} = spawn_monitor(fun() -> ok end),
  549:     receive {'DOWN',Ref,_,_,_} -> ok end,
  550:     F6 = fun (Pat) ->
  551: 		 set_trace_pattern(send, Pat, []),
  552: 		 Sender ! {send_please, Pid, to_dead},
  553: 		 {trace, Sender, send_to_non_existing_process, to_dead, Pid} = receive_first_trace(),
  554: 		 receive_nothing()
  555: 	 end,
  556:     lists:foreach(F6, [no,
  557: 		       [{[Pid,to_dead],[],[]}],
  558: 		       [{['_','_'],[],[]}],
  559: 		       true]),
  560: 
  561:     %% Check that a message sent to unknown registrated process is traced.
  562:     BadargSender = fun_spawn(fun sender/0),
  563:     1 = erlang_trace(BadargSender, true, [send]),
  564:     unlink(BadargSender),
  565:     BadargSender ! {send_please, not_registered, to_unknown},
  566:     {trace, BadargSender, send, to_unknown, not_registered} = receive_first_trace(),
  567:     receive_nothing(),
  568: 
  569:     %% Another process should not be able to trace Sender.
  570:     Intruder = fun_spawn(fun() -> erlang_trace(Sender, true, [send]) end),
  571:     {'EXIT', Intruder, {badarg, _}} = receive_first(),
  572: 
  573:     %% Untrace the sender process and make sure that we receive no more
  574:     %% trace messages.
  575:     1 = erlang_trace(Sender, false, [send]),
  576:     Sender ! {send_please, Receiver, to_receiver},
  577:     Sender ! {send_please, self(), to_myself_again},
  578:     receive to_myself_again -> ok end,
  579:     receive_nothing(),
  580:     
  581:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch erlang_trace_pattern(send, true, [global])),
  582:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch erlang_trace_pattern(send, true, [local])),
  583:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch erlang_trace_pattern(send, true, [meta])),
  584:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch erlang_trace_pattern(send, true, [{meta,self()}])),
  585:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch erlang_trace_pattern(send, true, [call_count])),
  586:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch erlang_trace_pattern(send, true, [call_time])),
  587:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch erlang_trace_pattern(send, restart, [])),
  588:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch erlang_trace_pattern(send, pause, [])),
  589:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch erlang_trace_pattern(send, [{['_','_'],[],[{caller}]}], [])),
  590: 
  591:     %% Done.
  592:     ok.
  593: 
  594: set_trace_pattern(_, no, _) -> 0;
  595: set_trace_pattern(MFA, Pat, Flg) ->
  596:     R = erlang_trace_pattern(MFA, Pat, Flg),
  597:     {match_spec, Pat} = erlang_trace_info(MFA, match_spec),
  598:     R.
  599: 
  600: %% Test trace(Pid, How, [procs]).
  601: procs_trace(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  602:     Name = list_to_atom(atom_to_list(?MODULE)++"_procs_trace"),
  603:     Self = self(),
  604:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  605:     %%
  606:     Proc1 = spawn_link(?MODULE, process, [Self]),
  607:     io:format("Proc1 = ~p ~n", [Proc1]),
  608:     Proc2 = spawn(?MODULE, process, [Self]),
  609:     io:format("Proc2 = ~p ~n", [Proc2]),
  610:     %%
  611:     1 = erlang_trace(Proc1, true, [procs, set_on_first_spawn]),
  612:     MFA = {?MODULE, process, [Self]},
  613:     %%
  614:     %% spawn, link
  615:     Proc1 ! {spawn_link_please, Self, MFA},
  616:     Proc3 = receive {spawned, Proc1, P3} -> P3 end,
  617:     receive {trace, Proc3, spawned, Proc1, MFA} -> ok end,
  618:     receive {trace, Proc3, getting_linked, Proc1} -> ok end,
  619:     {trace, Proc1, spawn, Proc3, MFA} = receive_first_trace(),
  620:     io:format("Proc3 = ~p ~n", [Proc3]),
  621:     {trace, Proc1, link, Proc3} = receive_first_trace(),
  622:     receive_nothing(),
  623:     %%
  624:     %% getting_unlinked by exit()
  625:     Proc1 ! {trap_exit_please, true},
  626:     Reason3 = make_ref(),
  627:     Proc1 ! {send_please, Proc3, {exit_please, Reason3}},
  628:     receive {Proc1, {'EXIT', Proc3, Reason3}} -> ok end,
  629:     receive {trace, Proc3, exit, Reason3} -> ok end,
  630:     {trace, Proc1, getting_unlinked, Proc3} = receive_first_trace(),
  631:     Proc1 ! {trap_exit_please, false},
  632:     receive_nothing(),
  633:     %%
  634:     %% link
  635:     Proc1 ! {link_please, Proc2},
  636:     {trace, Proc1, link, Proc2} = receive_first_trace(),
  637:     receive_nothing(),
  638:     %%
  639:     %% unlink
  640:     Proc1 ! {unlink_please, Proc2},
  641:     {trace, Proc1, unlink, Proc2} = receive_first_trace(),
  642:     receive_nothing(),
  643:     %%
  644:     %% getting_linked
  645:     Proc2 ! {link_please, Proc1},
  646:     {trace, Proc1, getting_linked, Proc2} = receive_first_trace(),
  647:     receive_nothing(),
  648:     %%
  649:     %% getting_unlinked
  650:     Proc2 ! {unlink_please, Proc1},
  651:     {trace, Proc1, getting_unlinked, Proc2} = receive_first_trace(),
  652:     receive_nothing(),
  653:     %%
  654:     %% register
  655:     true = register(Name, Proc1),
  656:     {trace, Proc1, register, Name} = receive_first_trace(),
  657:     receive_nothing(),
  658:     %%
  659:     %% unregister
  660:     true = unregister(Name),
  661:     {trace, Proc1, unregister, Name} = receive_first_trace(),
  662:     receive_nothing(),
  663:     %%
  664:     %% exit (with registered name, due to link)
  665:     Reason4 = make_ref(),
  666:     Proc1 ! {spawn_link_please, Self, MFA},
  667:     Proc4 = receive {spawned, Proc1, P4} -> P4 end,
  668:     {trace, Proc1, spawn, Proc4, MFA} = receive_first_trace(),
  669:     io:format("Proc4 = ~p ~n", [Proc4]),
  670:     {trace, Proc1, link, Proc4} = receive_first_trace(),
  671:     Proc1 ! {register_please, Name, Proc1},
  672:     {trace, Proc1, register, Name} = receive_first_trace(),
  673:     Proc4 ! {exit_please, Reason4},
  674:     receive {'EXIT', Proc1, Reason4} -> ok end,
  675:     {trace, Proc1, exit, Reason4} = receive_first_trace(),
  676:     {trace, Proc1, unregister, Name} = receive_first_trace(),
  677:     receive_nothing(),
  678:     %%
  679:     %% exit (not linked to tracing process)
  680:     1 = erlang_trace(Proc2, true, [procs]),
  681:     Reason2 = make_ref(),
  682:     Proc2 ! {exit_please, Reason2},
  683:     {trace, Proc2, exit, Reason2} = receive_first_trace(),
  684:     receive_nothing(),
  685:     ok.
  686: 
  687: 
  688: dist_procs_trace(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  689:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 15}),
  690:     {ok, Peer, OtherNode} = ?CT_PEER(),
  691:     Self = self(),
  692:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  693:     %%
  694:     Proc1 = spawn_link(?MODULE, process, [Self]),
  695:     io:format("Proc1 = ~p ~n", [Proc1]),
  696:     Proc2 = spawn(OtherNode, ?MODULE, process, [Self]),
  697:     io:format("Proc2 = ~p ~n", [Proc2]),
  698:     %%
  699:     1 = erlang_trace(Proc1, true, [procs]),
  700:     MFA = {?MODULE, process, [Self]},
  701:     %%
  702:     %% getting_unlinked by exit()
  703:     Proc1 ! {spawn_link_please, Self, OtherNode, MFA},
  704:     Proc1 ! {trap_exit_please, true},
  705:     Proc3 = receive {spawned, Proc1, P3} -> P3 end,
  706:     io:format("Proc3 = ~p ~n", [Proc3]),
  707:     {trace, Proc1, link, Proc3} = receive_first_trace(),
  708:     Reason3 = make_ref(),
  709:     Proc1 ! {send_please, Proc3, {exit_please, Reason3}},
  710:     receive {Proc1, {'EXIT', Proc3, Reason3}} -> ok end,
  711:     {trace, Proc1, getting_unlinked, Proc3} = receive_first_trace(),
  712:     Proc1 ! {trap_exit_please, false},
  713:     receive_nothing(),
  714:     %%
  715:     %% link
  716:     Proc1 ! {link_please, Proc2},
  717:     {trace, Proc1, link, Proc2} = receive_first_trace(),
  718:     receive_nothing(),
  719:     %%
  720:     %% unlink
  721:     Proc1 ! {unlink_please, Proc2},
  722:     {trace, Proc1, unlink, Proc2} = receive_first_trace(),
  723:     receive_nothing(),
  724:     %%
  725:     %% getting_linked
  726:     Proc2 ! {link_please, Proc1},
  727:     {trace, Proc1, getting_linked, Proc2} = receive_first_trace(),
  728:     receive_nothing(),
  729:     %%
  730:     %% getting_unlinked
  731:     Proc2 ! {unlink_please, Proc1},
  732:     {trace, Proc1, getting_unlinked, Proc2} = receive_first_trace(),
  733:     receive_nothing(),
  734: 
  735:     %%
  736:     %% exit (with registered name, due to link)
  737:     Name = list_to_atom(hd(string:lexemes(atom_to_list(OtherNode), "@"))),
  738:     Reason2 = make_ref(),
  739:     Proc1 ! {link_please, Proc2},
  740:     {trace, Proc1, link, Proc2} = receive_first_trace(),
  741:     Proc1 ! {register_please, Name, Proc1},
  742:     {trace, Proc1, register, Name} = receive_first_trace(),
  743:     Proc2 ! {exit_please, Reason2},
  744:     receive {'EXIT', Proc1, Reason2} -> ok end,
  745:     {trace, Proc1, exit, Reason2} = receive_first_trace(),
  746:     {trace, Proc1, unregister, Name} = receive_first_trace(),
  747:     receive_nothing(),
  748:     %%
  749:     %% Done.
  750:     peer:stop(Peer).
  751: 
  752: %% Test trace(new, How, [procs]).
  753: procs_new_trace(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  754:     Self = self(),
  755:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  756:     %%
  757:     Proc1 = spawn_link(?MODULE, process, [Self]),
  758:     io:format("Proc1 = ~p ~n", [Proc1]),
  759:     %%
  760:     0 = erlang_trace(new, true, [procs]),
  761: 
  762:     MFA = {?MODULE, process, [Self]},
  763:     %%
  764:     %% spawn, link
  765:     Proc1 ! {spawn_link_please, Self, MFA},
  766:     Proc3 = receive {spawned, Proc1, P3} -> P3 end,
  767:     receive {trace, Proc3, spawned, Proc1, MFA} -> ok end,
  768:     receive {trace, Proc3, getting_linked, Proc1} -> ok end,
  769:     io:format("Proc3 = ~p ~n", [Proc3]),
  770:     receive_nothing(),
  771:     %%
  772:     %%
  773:     %% exit (not linked to tracing process)
  774:     Reason1 = make_ref(),
  775:     Proc1 ! {exit_please, Reason1},
  776:     receive {'EXIT', Proc1, Reason1} -> ok end,
  777:     {trace, Proc3, exit, Reason1} = receive_first_trace(),
  778:     receive_nothing(),
  779:     ok.
  780: 
  781: 
  782: 
  783: %% Tests trace(Pid, How, [set_on_spawn]).
  784: 
  785: set_on_spawn(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  786:     Listener = fun_spawn(fun process/0),
  787: 
  788:     %% Create and trace a process with the set_on_spawn flag.
  789:     %% Make sure it is traced.
  790:     Father_SOS = fun_spawn(fun process/0),
  791:     1 = erlang_trace(Father_SOS, true, [send, set_on_spawn]),
  792:     true = is_send_traced(Father_SOS, Listener, sos_father),
  793: 
  794:     %% Have the process spawn of two children and test that they
  795:     %% are traced.
  796:     [Child1, Child2] = spawn_children(Father_SOS, 2),
  797:     true = is_send_traced(Child1, Listener, child1),
  798:     true = is_send_traced(Child2, Listener, child2),
  799: 
  800:     %% Second generation.
  801:     [Child11, Child12] = spawn_children(Child1, 2),
  802:     true = is_send_traced(Child11, Listener, child11),
  803:     true = is_send_traced(Child12, Listener, child12),
  804:     ok.
  805: 
  806: %% Tests trace(Pid, How, [set_on_first_spawn]).
  807: 
  808: set_on_first_spawn(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  809:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 10}),
  810:     Listener = fun_spawn(fun process/0),
  811: 
  812:     %% Create and trace a process with the set_on_first_spawn flag.
  813:     %% Make sure it is traced.
  814:     Parent = fun_spawn(fun process/0),
  815:     1 = erlang_trace(Parent, true, [send, set_on_first_spawn]),
  816:     is_send_traced(Parent, Listener, sos_father),
  817: 
  818:     %% Have the process spawn off three children and test that the
  819:     %% first is traced.
  820:     [Child1, Child2, Child3] = spawn_children(Parent, 3),
  821:     true = is_send_traced(Child1, Listener, child1),
  822:     false = is_send_traced(Child2, Listener, child2),
  823:     false = is_send_traced(Child3, Listener, child3),
  824:     receive_nothing(),
  825:     ok.
  826: 
  827: %% Tests trace(Pid, How, [set_on_link]).
  828: 
  829: set_on_link(_Config) ->
  830:     Listener = fun_spawn(fun process/0),
  831: 
  832:     %% Create and trace a process with the set_on_link flag.
  833:     %% Make sure it is traced.
  834:     Father_SOL = fun_spawn(fun process/0),
  835:     1 = erlang_trace(Father_SOL, true, [send, set_on_link]),
  836:     true = is_send_traced(Father_SOL, Listener, sol_father),
  837: 
  838:     %% Have the process spawn of two children and test that they
  839:     %% are traced.
  840:     [Child1, Child2] = spawn_children(Father_SOL, 2),
  841:     true = is_send_traced(Child1, Listener, child1),
  842:     true = is_send_traced(Child2, Listener, child2),
  843: 
  844:     %% Second generation.
  845:     [Child11, Child12] = spawn_children(Child1, 2),
  846:     true = is_send_traced(Child11, Listener, child11),
  847:     true = is_send_traced(Child12, Listener, child12),
  848:     ok.
  849: 
  850: %% Tests trace(Pid, How, [set_on_first_spawn]).
  851: 
  852: set_on_first_link(_Config) ->
  853:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 10}),
  854:     Listener = fun_spawn(fun process/0),
  855: 
  856:     %% Create and trace a process with the set_on_first_spawn flag.
  857:     %% Make sure it is traced.
  858:     Parent = fun_spawn(fun process/0),
  859:     1 = erlang_trace(Parent, true, [send, set_on_first_link]),
  860:     is_send_traced(Parent, Listener, sol_father),
  861: 
  862:     %% Have the process spawn off three children and test that the
  863:     %% first is traced.
  864:     [Child1, Child2, Child3] = spawn_children(Parent, 3),
  865:     true = is_send_traced(Child1, Listener, child1),
  866:     false = is_send_traced(Child2, Listener, child2),
  867:     false = is_send_traced(Child3, Listener, child3),
  868:     receive_nothing(),
  869:     ok.
  870: 
  871: 
  872: 
  873: %% Tests arguments to erlang:system_monitor/0,1,2
  874: system_monitor_args(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  875:     Self = self(),
  876:     %%
  877:     OldMonitor = erlang:system_monitor(undefined),
  878:     undefined = erlang:system_monitor(Self, [{long_gc,0}]),
  879:     MinT = case erlang:system_monitor() of
  880:                {Self,[{long_gc,T}]} when is_integer(T), T > 0 -> T;
  881:                Other1 -> test_server:fault(Other1)
  882:            end,
  883:     {Self,[{long_gc,MinT}]} = erlang:system_monitor(),
  884:     {Self,[{long_gc,MinT}]} = 
  885:     erlang:system_monitor({Self,[{large_heap,0}]}),
  886:     MinN = case erlang:system_monitor() of
  887:                {Self,[{large_heap,N}]} when is_integer(N), N > 0 -> N;
  888:                Other2 -> test_server:fault(Other2)
  889:            end,
  890:     {Self,[{large_heap,MinN}]} = erlang:system_monitor(),
  891:     {Self,[{large_heap,MinN}]} = 
  892:         erlang:system_monitor(Self,[{long_message_queue, {100,101}}]),
  893:     {Self,[{long_message_queue,{100,101}}]} = erlang:system_monitor(),
  894:     {Self,[{long_message_queue,{100,101}}]} =
  895:         erlang:system_monitor(Self, [busy_port]),
  896:     {Self,[busy_port]} = erlang:system_monitor(),
  897:     {Self,[busy_port]} = 
  898:     erlang:system_monitor({Self,[busy_dist_port]}),
  899:     {Self,[busy_dist_port]} = erlang:system_monitor(),
  900:     All = lists:sort([busy_port,busy_dist_port,
  901:                       {long_gc,1},{large_heap,65535},{long_message_queue,{99,100}}]),
  902:     {Self,[busy_dist_port]} = erlang:system_monitor(Self, All),
  903:     {Self,A1} = erlang:system_monitor(),
  904:     All = lists:sort(A1),
  905:     {Self,A1} = erlang:system_monitor(Self, []),
  906:     Pid = spawn(fun () -> receive {Self,die} -> exit(die) end end),
  907:     Mref = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
  908:     undefined = erlang:system_monitor(Pid, All),
  909:     {Pid,A2} = erlang:system_monitor(),
  910:     All = lists:sort(A2),
  911:     Pid ! {Self,die},
  912:     receive {'DOWN',Mref,_,_,_} -> ok end,
  913:     undefined = erlang:system_monitor(OldMonitor),
  914:     erlang:yield(),
  915:     OldMonitor = erlang:system_monitor(),
  916:     %%
  917:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch erlang:system_monitor(atom)),
  918:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch erlang:system_monitor({})),
  919:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch erlang:system_monitor({1})),
  920:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch erlang:system_monitor({1,2,3})),
  921:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = 
  922:     (catch erlang:system_monitor({Self,atom})),
  923:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = 
  924:     (catch erlang:system_monitor(atom, atom)),
  925:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = 
  926:     (catch erlang:system_monitor({Self,[busy_port|busy_dist_port]})),
  927:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = 
  928:     (catch erlang:system_monitor(Self, [{long_gc,-1}])),
  929:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = 
  930:     (catch erlang:system_monitor({Self,[{long_gc,atom}]})),
  931:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = 
  932:     (catch erlang:system_monitor(Self,[{large_heap,-1}])),
  933:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = 
  934:     (catch erlang:system_monitor({Self,[{large_heap,atom}]})),
  935:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = 
  936:         (catch erlang:system_monitor(Self,[{long_message_queue, {100,100}}])),
  937:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = 
  938:         (catch erlang:system_monitor(Self,[{long_message_queue, {-1,1}}])),
  939:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = 
  940:         (catch erlang:system_monitor(Self,[{long_message_queue, {0,-1}}])),
  941:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = 
  942:         (catch erlang:system_monitor(Self,[{long_message_queue, {-1,0}}])),
  943:     ok.
  944: 
  945: 
  946: %% Tests arguments to erlang:system_monitor/0,1,2
  947: more_system_monitor_args(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  948:     try_l(64000),
  949:     try_l(16#7ffffff),
  950:     try_l(16#3fffffff),
  951:     try_l(16#7fffffff),
  952:     try_l(16#ffffffff),
  953:     ok.
  954: 
  955: try_l(Val) ->
  956:     Self = self(),
  957:     Arbitrary1 = 77777,
  958:     Arbitrary2 = 88888,
  959: 
  960:     erlang:system_monitor(undefined),
  961: 
  962:     undefined = erlang:system_monitor(Self, [{long_gc,Val},{large_heap,Arbitrary1}]),
  963: 
  964:     {Self,Comb0} = erlang:system_monitor(Self, [{long_gc,Arbitrary2},{large_heap,Val}]),
  965:     [{large_heap,Arbitrary1},{long_gc,Val}] = lists:sort(Comb0),
  966: 
  967:     {Self,Comb1} = erlang:system_monitor(undefined),
  968:     [{large_heap,Val},{long_gc,Arbitrary2}] = lists:sort(Comb1).
  969: 
  970: monitor_sys(Parent) ->
  971:     receive 
  972:         {monitor,Pid,long_schedule,Data} when is_pid(Pid) -> 
  973:             io:format("Long schedule of ~w: ~w~n",[Pid,Data]),
  974:             Parent ! {Pid,Data},
  975:             monitor_sys(Parent);
  976:         {monitor,Port,long_schedule,Data} when is_port(Port) -> 
  977:             {name,Name} = erlang:port_info(Port,name),
  978:             io:format("Long schedule of ~w (~p): ~w~n",[Port,Name,Data]),
  979:             Parent ! {Port,Data},
  980:             monitor_sys(Parent);
  981:         Other ->
  982:             erlang:display(Other)
  983:     end.
  984: 
  985: start_monitor() ->
  986:     Parent = self(),
  987:     Mpid = spawn_link(fun() -> monitor_sys(Parent) end),
  988:     erlang:system_monitor(Mpid,[{long_schedule,100}]),
  989:     erlang:yield(), % Need to be rescheduled for the trace to take
  990:     ok.
  991: 
  992: %% Tests erlang:system_monitor(Pid, [{long_schedule,Time}])
  993: system_monitor_long_schedule(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  994:     Path = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  995:     erl_ddll:start(),
  996:     case (catch load_driver(Path, slow_drv)) of
  997:         ok ->
  998:             do_system_monitor_long_schedule();
  999:         _Error ->
 1000:             {skip, "Unable to load slow_drv (windows or no usleep()?)"}
 1001:     end.
 1002: do_system_monitor_long_schedule() ->
 1003:     start_monitor(),
 1004:     Port = open_port({spawn_driver,slow_drv}, []),
 1005:     "ok" = erlang:port_control(Port,0,[]),
 1006:     Self = self(),
 1007:     receive
 1008:         {Self,L} when is_list(L) ->
 1009:             ok
 1010:     after 1000 ->
 1011:             ct:fail(no_trace_of_pid)
 1012:     end,
 1013:     "ok" = erlang:port_control(Port,1,[]),
 1014:     receive
 1015:         {Port,LL} when is_list(LL) ->
 1016:             ok
 1017:     after 1000 ->
 1018:             ct:fail(no_trace_of_port)
 1019:     end,
 1020:     port_close(Port),
 1021:     erlang:system_monitor(undefined),
 1022:     ok.
 1023: 
 1024: 
 1025: -define(LONG_GC_SLEEP, 670).
 1026: 
 1027: %% Tests erlang:system_monitor(Pid, [{long_gc,Time}])
 1028: system_monitor_long_gc_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1029:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
 1030:     try 
 1031:         case erts_debug:get_internal_state(force_heap_frags) of
 1032:             true ->
 1033:                 {skip,"emulator with FORCE_HEAP_FRAGS defined"};
 1034:             false ->
 1035:                 %% Add ?LONG_GC_SLEEP ms to all gc
 1036:                 erts_debug:set_internal_state(test_long_gc_sleep,
 1037:                                               ?LONG_GC_SLEEP),
 1038:                 LoadFun = fun () -> 
 1039:                                   garbage_collect(),
 1040:                                   self() 
 1041:                           end,
 1042:                 long_gc(LoadFun, false)
 1043:         end
 1044:     after
 1045:         erts_debug:set_internal_state(test_long_gc_sleep, 0),
 1046:         erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, false)	
 1047:     end.
 1048: 
 1049: %% Tests erlang:system_monitor(Pid, [{long_gc,Time}])
 1050: system_monitor_long_gc_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1051:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
 1052:     try
 1053:         case erts_debug:get_internal_state(force_heap_frags) of
 1054:             true ->
 1055:                 {skip,"emulator with FORCE_HEAP_FRAGS defined"};
 1056:             false ->
 1057:                 %% Add ?LONG_GC_SLEEP ms to all gc
 1058:                 erts_debug:set_internal_state(test_long_gc_sleep,
 1059:                                               ?LONG_GC_SLEEP),
 1060:                 Parent = self(),
 1061:                 LoadFun =
 1062:                 fun () ->
 1063:                         Ref = make_ref(),
 1064:                         Pid = 
 1065:                         spawn_link(
 1066:                           fun () ->
 1067:                                   garbage_collect(),
 1068:                                   Parent ! {Ref, self()}
 1069:                           end),
 1070:                         receive {Ref, Pid} -> Pid end
 1071:                 end,
 1072:                 long_gc(LoadFun, true),
 1073:                 long_gc(LoadFun, true),
 1074:                 long_gc(LoadFun, true)
 1075:         end
 1076:     after
 1077:         erts_debug:set_internal_state(test_long_gc_sleep, 0),
 1078:         erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, false)
 1079:     end.
 1080: 
 1081: long_gc(LoadFun, ExpectMonMsg) ->
 1082:     Self = self(),
 1083:     Time = 1,
 1084:     OldMonitor = erlang:system_monitor(Self, [{long_gc,Time}]),
 1085:     Pid = LoadFun(),
 1086:     Ref = erlang:trace_delivered(Pid),
 1087:     receive {trace_delivered, Pid, Ref} -> ok end,
 1088:     {Self,[{long_gc,Time}]} = erlang:system_monitor(OldMonitor),
 1089:     case {long_gc_check(Pid, Time, undefined), ExpectMonMsg} of
 1090:         {ok, true} when Pid =/= Self ->
 1091:             ok;
 1092:         {ok, false} ->
 1093:             ct:fail(unexpected_system_monitor_message_received);
 1094:         {undefined, false} ->
 1095:             ok;
 1096:         {undefined, true} ->
 1097:             ct:fail(no_system_monitor_message_received)
 1098:     end.
 1099: 
 1100: long_gc_check(Pid, Time, Result) ->
 1101:     receive
 1102:         {monitor,Pid,long_gc,L} = Monitor ->
 1103:             case lists:foldl(
 1104:                    fun (_, error) ->
 1105:                            error;
 1106:                        ({timeout,T}, N) when is_integer(T),
 1107:                                              Time =< T, T =< 10*?LONG_GC_SLEEP ->
 1108:                            %% OTP-7622. The time T must be within reasonable limits
 1109:                            %% for the test to pass.
 1110:                            N-1;
 1111:                        ({heap_size,_}, N) ->
 1112:                            N-1;
 1113:                        ({old_heap_size,_}, N) ->
 1114:                            N-1;
 1115:                        ({stack_size,_}, N) ->
 1116:                            N-1;
 1117:                        ({mbuf_size,_}, N) ->
 1118:                            N-1;
 1119:                        ({heap_block_size,_}, N) ->
 1120:                            N-1;
 1121:                        ({old_heap_block_size,_}, N) ->
 1122:                            N-1;
 1123:                        (_, _) ->
 1124:                            error
 1125:                    end, 7, L) of
 1126:                 0 ->
 1127:                     long_gc_check(Pid, Time, ok);
 1128:                 error ->
 1129:                     {error,Monitor}
 1130:             end;
 1131:         {monitor,_,long_gc,_} ->
 1132:             long_gc_check(Pid, Time, Result);
 1133:         Other ->
 1134:             {error,Other}
 1135:     after 0 ->
 1136:               Result
 1137:     end.
 1138: 
 1139: %% Tests erlang:system_monitor(Pid, [{large_heap,Size}])
 1140: system_monitor_large_heap_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1141:     LoadFun =
 1142:     fun (Size) -> 
 1143:             List = seq(1,2*Size),
 1144:             garbage_collect(),
 1145:             true = lists:prefix([1], List),
 1146:             self() 
 1147:     end,
 1148:     large_heap(LoadFun, false).
 1149: 
 1150: %% Tests erlang:system_monitor(Pid, [{large_heap,Size}])
 1151: system_monitor_large_heap_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1152:     Parent = self(),
 1153:     LoadFun =
 1154:     fun (Size) ->
 1155:             Ref = make_ref(),
 1156:             Pid = 
 1157:             spawn_opt(fun () ->
 1158:                               garbage_collect(),
 1159:                               Parent ! {Ref, self()}
 1160:                       end,
 1161:                       [link, {min_heap_size, 2*Size}]),
 1162:             receive {Ref, Pid} -> Pid end
 1163:     end,
 1164:     large_heap(LoadFun, true).
 1165: 
 1166: large_heap(LoadFun, ExpectMonMsg) ->
 1167:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 20}),
 1168:     %%
 1169:     Size = 65535,
 1170:     Self = self(),
 1171:     NewMonitor = {Self,[{large_heap,Size}]},
 1172:     OldMonitor = erlang:system_monitor(NewMonitor),
 1173:     Pid = LoadFun(Size),
 1174:     Ref = erlang:trace_delivered(Pid),
 1175:     receive {trace_delivered, Pid, Ref} -> ok end,
 1176:     {Self,[{large_heap,Size}]} = erlang:system_monitor(OldMonitor),
 1177:     case {large_heap_check(Pid, Size, undefined), ExpectMonMsg} of
 1178:         {ok, true} when Pid =/= Self ->
 1179:             ok;
 1180:         {ok, false} ->
 1181:             ct:fail(unexpected_system_monitor_message_received);
 1182:         {undefined, false} ->
 1183:             ok;
 1184:         {undefined, true} ->
 1185:             ct:fail(no_system_monitor_message_received)
 1186:     end,
 1187:     ok.
 1188: 
 1189: large_heap_check(Pid, Size, Result) ->
 1190:     receive
 1191:         {monitor,Pid,large_heap,L} = Monitor ->
 1192:             case lists:foldl(
 1193:                    fun (_, error) ->
 1194:                            error;
 1195:                        ({heap_size,_}, N) ->
 1196:                            N-1;
 1197:                        ({old_heap_size,_}, N) ->
 1198:                            N-1;
 1199:                        ({stack_size,_}, N) ->
 1200:                            N-1;
 1201:                        ({mbuf_size,_}, N) ->
 1202:                            N-1;
 1203:                        ({heap_block_size,_}, N) ->
 1204:                            N-1;
 1205:                        ({old_heap_block_size,_}, N) ->
 1206:                            N-1;
 1207:                        (_, _) ->
 1208:                            error
 1209:                    end, 6, L) of
 1210:                 0 ->
 1211:                     large_heap_check(Pid, Size, ok);
 1212:                 error ->
 1213:                     {error,Monitor}
 1214:             end;
 1215:         {monitor,_,large_heap,_} ->
 1216:             large_heap_check(Pid, Size, Result);
 1217:         Other ->
 1218:             {error,Other}
 1219:     after 0 ->
 1220:               Result
 1221:     end.
 1222: 
 1223: 
 1224: system_monitor_long_message_queue(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1225:     Self = self(),
 1226:     SMonPrxy = spawn_link(fun () -> smon_lmq_proxy(Self) end),
 1227:     erlang:system_monitor(SMonPrxy,[{long_message_queue, {50,100}}]),
 1228:     erlang:yield(),
 1229:     lists:foreach(fun (_) -> self() ! hello end, lists:seq(1, 100)),
 1230:     receive {monitor,Self,long_message_queue,true} -> ok
 1231:     after 5000 -> ct:fail(missing_on_message)
 1232:     end,
 1233: 
 1234:     lists:foreach(fun (_) -> self() ! hello end, lists:seq(1, 10)),
 1235:     receive {monitor,Self,long_message_queue,_} = Msg0 -> ct:fail({unexpected_message, Msg0})
 1236:     after 1000 -> ok
 1237:     end,
 1238: 
 1239:     lists:foreach(fun (_) -> receive hello -> ok end end, lists:seq(1, 50)),
 1240:     receive {monitor,Self,long_message_queue,_} = Msg1 -> ct:fail({unexpected_message, Msg1})
 1241:     after 1000 -> ok
 1242:     end,
 1243: 
 1244:     lists:foreach(fun (_) -> self() ! hello end, lists:seq(1, 50)),
 1245:     receive {monitor,Self,long_message_queue,_} = Msg2 -> ct:fail({unexpected_message, Msg2})
 1246:     after 1000 -> ok
 1247:     end,
 1248: 
 1249:     lists:foreach(fun (_) -> receive hello -> ok end end, lists:seq(1, 60)),
 1250:     receive {monitor,Self,long_message_queue,false} -> ok
 1251:     after 5000 -> ct:fail(missing_off_message)
 1252:     end,
 1253: 
 1254:     lists:foreach(fun (_) -> self() ! hello end, lists:seq(1, 100)),
 1255:     receive {monitor,Self,long_message_queue,true} -> ok
 1256:     after 5000 -> ct:fail(missing_on_message)
 1257:     end,
 1258: 
 1259:     lists:foreach(fun (_) -> receive hello -> ok end end, lists:seq(1, 100)),
 1260:     receive {monitor,Self,long_message_queue,false} -> ok
 1261:     after 5000 -> ct:fail(missing_off_message)
 1262:     end,
 1263: 
 1264:     lists:foreach(fun (_) -> receive hello -> ok end end, lists:seq(1, 50)),
 1265:     {message_queue_len, 0} = process_info(self(), message_queue_len),
 1266: 
 1267:     unlink(SMonPrxy),
 1268:     exit(SMonPrxy, kill),
 1269:     false = is_process_alive(SMonPrxy),
 1270: 
 1271:     erlang:system_monitor(undefined),
 1272:     ok.
 1273: 
 1274: smon_lmq_proxy(To) ->
 1275:     receive Msg -> To ! Msg end,
 1276:     smon_lmq_proxy(To).
 1277: 
 1278: system_monitor_long_message_queue_ignore(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1279:     %%
 1280:     %% Ensure that messages are delivered and monitored even if a
 1281:     %% process ignores the message queue while continuesly executing.
 1282:     %%
 1283:     erlang:system_monitor(self(),[{long_message_queue, {50,100}}]),
 1284:     Pid = spawn_opt(fun ignore_messages_working/0, [{priority,low}, link]),
 1285:     lists:foreach(fun (_) -> Pid ! hello end, lists:seq(1, 50)),
 1286:     receive {monitor,Pid,long_message_queue,_} = Msg0 -> ct:fail({unexpected_message, Msg0})
 1287:     after 1000 -> ok
 1288:     end,
 1289: 
 1290:     lists:foreach(fun (_) -> Pid ! hello end, lists:seq(1, 50)),
 1291:     receive {monitor,Pid,long_message_queue,true} -> ok
 1292:     after 5000 -> ct:fail(missing_on_message)
 1293:     end,
 1294: 
 1295:     unlink(Pid),
 1296:     exit(Pid, kill),
 1297:     false = is_process_alive(Pid),
 1298: 
 1299:     erlang:system_monitor(undefined),
 1300: 
 1301:     ok.
 1302: 
 1303: ignore_messages_working() ->
 1304:     _ = id(lists:seq(1, 10000)),
 1305:     ignore_messages_working().
 1306: 
 1307: id(X) ->
 1308:     X.
 1309: 
 1310: seq(N, M) ->
 1311:     seq(N, M, []).
 1312: 
 1313: seq(M, M, R) ->
 1314:     lists:reverse(R);
 1315: seq(N, M, R) ->
 1316:     seq(N+1, M, [N|R]).
 1317: 
 1318: 
 1319: is_send_traced(Pid, Listener, Msg) ->
 1320:     Pid ! {send_please, Listener, Msg},
 1321:     receive
 1322:         Any ->
 1323:             {trace, Pid, send, Msg, Listener} = Any,
 1324:             true
 1325:     after 1000 ->
 1326:               false
 1327:     end.
 1328: 
 1329: %% This procedure assumes that the Parent process is send traced.
 1330: 
 1331: spawn_children(Parent, Number) ->
 1332:     spawn_children(Parent, Number, []).
 1333: 
 1334: spawn_children(_Parent, 0, Result) ->
 1335:     lists:reverse(Result);
 1336: spawn_children(Parent, Number, Result) ->
 1337:     Self = self(),
 1338:     Parent ! {spawn_please, Self, fun process/0},
 1339:     Child = 
 1340:     receive
 1341:         {trace, Parent, send, {spawned, Pid}, Self} -> Pid
 1342:     end,
 1343:     receive
 1344:         {spawned, Child} ->
 1345:             spawn_children(Parent, Number-1, [Child|Result])
 1346:     end.
 1347: 
 1348: %% Test erlang:suspend/1 and erlang:resume/1.
 1349: suspend(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1350:     ct:timetrap({minutes,2}),
 1351:     Worker = fun_spawn(fun worker/0),
 1352:     %% Suspend a process and test that it is suspended.
 1353:     ok = do_suspend(Worker, 10000),
 1354:     ok.
 1355: 
 1356: do_suspend(_Pid, 0) ->
 1357:     ok;
 1358: do_suspend(Pid, N) ->
 1359:     %% Suspend a process and test that it is suspended.
 1360:     true = erlang:suspend_process(Pid),
 1361:     {status, suspended} = process_info(Pid, status),
 1362: 
 1363:     %% Unsuspend the process and make sure it starts working.
 1364:     true = erlang:resume_process(Pid),
 1365:     case process_info(Pid, status) of
 1366:         {status, runnable} -> ok;
 1367:         {status, running} -> ok;
 1368:         {status, garbage_collecting} -> ok;
 1369:         ST -> ct:fail(ST)
 1370:     end,
 1371:     erlang:yield(),
 1372:     do_suspend(Pid, N-1).
 1373: 
 1374: suspend_exit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1375:     ct:timetrap({minutes, 2}),
 1376:     rand:seed(exsplus, {4711,17,4711}),
 1377:     do_suspend_exit(5000),
 1378:     ok.
 1379: 
 1380: do_suspend_exit(0) ->
 1381:     ok;
 1382: do_suspend_exit(N) ->
 1383:     Work = rand:uniform(50),
 1384:     Parent = self(),
 1385:     {Suspendee, Mon2}
 1386:     = spawn_monitor(fun () ->
 1387:                             suspend_exit_work(Work),
 1388:                             exit(normal)
 1389:                     end),
 1390:     {Suspender, Mon1}
 1391:     = spawn_monitor(
 1392:         fun () ->
 1393:                 suspend_exit_work(Work div 2),
 1394:                 Parent ! {doing_suspend, self()},
 1395:                 case catch erlang:suspend_process(Suspendee) of
 1396:                     {'EXIT', _} ->
 1397:                         ok;
 1398:                     true ->
 1399:                         erlang:resume_process(Suspendee)
 1400:                 end
 1401:         end),
 1402:     receive
 1403:         {doing_suspend, Suspender} ->
 1404:             case N rem 2 of
 1405:                 0 -> exit(Suspender, bang);
 1406:                 1 -> ok
 1407:             end
 1408:     end,
 1409:     receive {'DOWN', Mon1, process, Suspender, _} -> ok end,
 1410:     receive {'DOWN', Mon2, process, Suspendee, _} -> ok end,
 1411:     do_suspend_exit(N-1).
 1412: 
 1413: 
 1414: 
 1415: 
 1416: suspend_exit_work(0) ->
 1417:     ok;
 1418: suspend_exit_work(N) ->
 1419:     process_info(self()),
 1420:     suspend_exit_work(N-1).
 1421: 
 1422: -define(CHK_SUSPENDED(P,B), chk_suspended(P, B, ?LINE)).
 1423: 
 1424: chk_suspended(P, Bool, Line) ->
 1425:     {Bool, Line} = {({status, suspended} == process_info(P, status)), Line}.
 1426: 
 1427: suspender_exit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1428:     ct:timetrap({minutes, 3}),
 1429:     P1 = spawn_link(fun () -> receive after infinity -> ok end end),
 1430:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch erlang:resume_process(P1)),
 1431:     {P2, M2} = spawn_monitor(
 1432:                  fun () ->
 1433:                          ?CHK_SUSPENDED(P1, false),
 1434:                          erlang:suspend_process(P1),
 1435:                          ?CHK_SUSPENDED(P1, true),
 1436:                          erlang:suspend_process(P1),
 1437:                          erlang:suspend_process(P1),
 1438:                          erlang:suspend_process(P1),
 1439:                          ?CHK_SUSPENDED(P1, true),
 1440:                          erlang:resume_process(P1),
 1441:                          erlang:resume_process(P1),
 1442:                          erlang:resume_process(P1),
 1443:                          ?CHK_SUSPENDED(P1, true),
 1444:                          erlang:resume_process(P1),
 1445:                          ?CHK_SUSPENDED(P1, false),
 1446:                          erlang:suspend_process(P1),
 1447:                          erlang:suspend_process(P1),
 1448:                          erlang:suspend_process(P1),
 1449:                          ?CHK_SUSPENDED(P1, true),
 1450:                          exit(bang)
 1451:                  end),
 1452:     receive
 1453:         {'DOWN', M2,process,P2,R2} ->
 1454:             bang = R2,
 1455:             ?CHK_SUSPENDED(P1, false)
 1456:     end,
 1457:     Parent = self(),
 1458:     {P3, M3} = spawn_monitor(
 1459:                  fun () ->
 1460:                          erlang:suspend_process(P1),
 1461:                          ?CHK_SUSPENDED(P1, true),
 1462:                          Parent ! self(),
 1463:                          receive after infinity -> ok end
 1464:                  end),
 1465:     {P4, M4} = spawn_monitor(
 1466:                  fun () ->
 1467:                          erlang:suspend_process(P1),
 1468:                          ?CHK_SUSPENDED(P1, true),
 1469:                          Parent ! self(),
 1470:                          receive after infinity -> ok end
 1471:                  end),
 1472:     {P5, M5} = spawn_monitor(
 1473:                  fun () ->
 1474:                          erlang:suspend_process(P1),
 1475:                          ?CHK_SUSPENDED(P1, true),
 1476:                          Parent ! self(),
 1477:                          receive after infinity -> ok end
 1478:                  end),
 1479:     {P6, M6} = spawn_monitor(
 1480:                  fun () ->
 1481:                          erlang:suspend_process(P1),
 1482:                          ?CHK_SUSPENDED(P1, true),
 1483:                          Parent ! self(),
 1484:                          receive after infinity -> ok end
 1485:                  end),
 1486:     {P7, M7} = spawn_monitor(
 1487:                  fun () ->
 1488:                          erlang:suspend_process(P1),
 1489:                          ?CHK_SUSPENDED(P1, true),
 1490:                          Parent ! self(),
 1491:                          receive after infinity -> ok end
 1492:                  end),
 1493:     receive P3 -> ok end,
 1494:     receive P4 -> ok end,
 1495:     receive P5 -> ok end,
 1496:     receive P6 -> ok end,
 1497:     receive P7 -> ok end,
 1498:     ?CHK_SUSPENDED(P1, true),
 1499:     exit(P3, bang),
 1500:     receive
 1501:         {'DOWN',M3,process,P3,R3} ->
 1502:             bang = R3,
 1503:             ?CHK_SUSPENDED(P1, true)
 1504:     end,
 1505:     exit(P4, bang),
 1506:     receive
 1507:         {'DOWN',M4,process,P4,R4} ->
 1508:             bang = R4,
 1509:             ?CHK_SUSPENDED(P1, true)
 1510:     end,
 1511:     exit(P5, bang),
 1512:     receive
 1513:         {'DOWN',M5,process,P5,R5} ->
 1514:             bang = R5,
 1515:             ?CHK_SUSPENDED(P1, true)
 1516:     end,
 1517:     exit(P6, bang),
 1518:     receive
 1519:         {'DOWN',M6,process,P6,R6} ->
 1520:             bang = R6,
 1521:             ?CHK_SUSPENDED(P1, true)
 1522:     end,
 1523:     exit(P7, bang),
 1524:     receive
 1525:         {'DOWN',M7,process,P7,R7} ->
 1526:             bang = R7,
 1527:             ?CHK_SUSPENDED(P1, false)
 1528:     end,
 1529:     unlink(P1),
 1530:     exit(P1, bong),
 1531:     ok.
 1532: 
 1533: suspend_system_limit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1534:     case os:getenv("ERL_EXTREME_TESTING") of
 1535:         "true" ->
 1536:             ct:timetrap({minutes, 3*60}),
 1537:             P = spawn_link(fun () -> receive after infinity -> ok end end),
 1538:             suspend_until_system_limit(P),
 1539:             unlink(P),
 1540:             exit(P, bye),
 1541:             ok;
 1542:         _ ->
 1543:             {skip, "Takes too long time for normal testing"}
 1544:     end.
 1545: 
 1546: suspend_until_system_limit(P) ->
 1547:     suspend_until_system_limit(P, 0, 0).
 1548: 
 1549: suspend_until_system_limit(P, N, M) ->
 1550:     NewM = case M of
 1551:                1 ->
 1552:                    ?CHK_SUSPENDED(P, true), 2;
 1553:                1000000 ->
 1554:                    erlang:display(N), 1;
 1555:                _ ->
 1556:                    M+1
 1557:            end,
 1558:     case catch erlang:suspend_process(P) of
 1559:         true ->
 1560:             suspend_until_system_limit(P, N+1, NewM);
 1561:         {'EXIT', R} when R == system_limit;
 1562:                          element(1, R) == system_limit ->
 1563:             io:format("system limit at ~p~n", [N]),
 1564:             resume_from_system_limit(P, N, 0);
 1565:         Error ->
 1566:             ct:fail(Error)
 1567:     end.
 1568: 
 1569: resume_from_system_limit(P, 0, _) ->
 1570:     ?CHK_SUSPENDED(P, false),
 1571:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch erlang:resume_process(P)),
 1572:     ok;
 1573: resume_from_system_limit(P, N, M) ->
 1574:     NewM = case M of
 1575:                1 ->
 1576:                    ?CHK_SUSPENDED(P, true), 2;
 1577:                1000000 ->
 1578:                    erlang:display(N), 1;
 1579:                _ ->
 1580:                    M+1
 1581:            end,
 1582:     erlang:resume_process(P),
 1583:     resume_from_system_limit(P, N-1, NewM).
 1584: 
 1585: -record(susp_info, {async = 0,
 1586:                     dbl_async = 0,
 1587:                     synced = 0,
 1588:                     async_once = 0}).
 1589: 
 1590: suspend_opts(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1591:     ct:timetrap({minutes, 3}),
 1592:     Self = self(),
 1593:     wait_for_empty_runq(10),
 1594:     Tok = spawn_link(fun () ->
 1595:                              Self ! self(),
 1596:                              tok_trace_loop(Self, 0, 1000000000)
 1597:                      end),
 1598:     TC = 1000,
 1599:     receive Tok -> ok end,
 1600:     SF = fun (N, #susp_info {async = A,
 1601:                              dbl_async = AA,
 1602:                              synced = S,
 1603:                              async_once = AO} = Acc) ->
 1604:                  Tag = {make_ref(), self()},
 1605:                  erlang:suspend_process(Tok, [{asynchronous, Tag}]),
 1606:                  Res = case {suspend_count(Tok), N rem 4} of
 1607:                            {0, 2} ->
 1608:                                erlang:suspend_process(Tok,
 1609:                                                       [asynchronous]),
 1610:                                case suspend_count(Tok) of
 1611:                                    2 ->
 1612:                                        erlang:resume_process(Tok),
 1613:                                        Acc#susp_info{async = A+1};
 1614:                                    0 ->
 1615:                                        erlang:resume_process(Tok),
 1616:                                        Acc#susp_info{async = A+1,
 1617:                                                      dbl_async = AA+1}
 1618:                                end;
 1619:                            {0, 1} ->
 1620:                                erlang:suspend_process(Tok,
 1621:                                                       [asynchronous,
 1622:                                                        unless_suspending]),
 1623:                                case suspend_count(Tok) of
 1624:                                    1 ->
 1625:                                        Acc#susp_info{async = A+1};
 1626:                                    0 ->
 1627:                                        Acc#susp_info{async = A+1,
 1628:                                                      async_once = AO+1}
 1629:                                end;
 1630:                            {0, 0} ->
 1631:                                erlang:suspend_process(Tok,
 1632:                                                       [unless_suspending]),
 1633:                                1 = suspend_count(Tok),
 1634:                                Acc#susp_info{async = A+1,
 1635:                                              synced = S+1};
 1636:                            {0, _} ->
 1637:                                Acc#susp_info{async = A+1};
 1638:                            _ ->
 1639:                                Acc
 1640:                        end,
 1641:                  receive
 1642:                      {Tag, Result} ->
 1643:                          suspended = Result,
 1644:                          erlang:resume_process(Tok)
 1645:                  end,
 1646:                  erlang:yield(),
 1647:                  Res
 1648:          end,
 1649:     SI = repeat_acc(SF, TC, #susp_info{}),
 1650:     erlang:suspend_process(Tok, [asynchronous]),
 1651:     %% Verify that it eventually suspends
 1652:     WaitTime0 = 20,
 1653:     WaitTime1 = WaitTime0 *
 1654:         case erlang:system_info(emu_type) of
 1655:             debug -> 2;
 1656:             gcov -> 2;
 1657:             asan -> 2;
 1658:             valgrind -> 10;
 1659:             _ -> 1
 1660:         end,
 1661:     WaitTime2 = WaitTime1 *
 1662:         case erlang:system_info(lock_checking) of
 1663:             true -> 5;
 1664:             false -> 1
 1665:         end,
 1666:     WaitTime = WaitTime2 *
 1667:         case {erlang:system_info(schedulers_online),
 1668:               erlang:system_info(logical_processors)} of
 1669:             {Schdlrs, CPUs} when is_integer(CPUs),
 1670:                                  Schdlrs =< CPUs ->
 1671:                 1;
 1672:             _ ->
 1673:                 10
 1674:         end,
 1675:     receive after WaitTime -> ok end,
 1676:     1 = suspend_count(Tok),
 1677:     erlang:suspend_process(Tok, [asynchronous]),
 1678:     2 = suspend_count(Tok),
 1679:     erlang:suspend_process(Tok, [asynchronous]),
 1680:     3 = suspend_count(Tok),
 1681:     erlang:suspend_process(Tok),
 1682:     4 = suspend_count(Tok),
 1683:     erlang:suspend_process(Tok),
 1684:     5 = suspend_count(Tok),
 1685:     erlang:suspend_process(Tok, [unless_suspending]),
 1686:     5 = suspend_count(Tok),
 1687:     erlang:suspend_process(Tok, [unless_suspending,
 1688:                                  asynchronous]),
 1689:     5 = suspend_count(Tok),
 1690:     erlang:resume_process(Tok),
 1691:     erlang:resume_process(Tok),
 1692:     erlang:resume_process(Tok),
 1693:     erlang:resume_process(Tok),
 1694:     1 = suspend_count(Tok),
 1695:     io:format("Main suspends: ~p~n"
 1696:               "Main async: ~p~n"
 1697:               "Double async: ~p~n"
 1698:               "Async once: ~p~n"
 1699:               "Synced: ~p~n",
 1700:               [TC,
 1701:                SI#susp_info.async,
 1702:                SI#susp_info.dbl_async,
 1703:                SI#susp_info.async_once,
 1704:                SI#susp_info.synced]),
 1705:     case erlang:system_info(schedulers_online) of
 1706:         1 ->
 1707:             ok;
 1708:         _ ->
 1709:             true = SI#susp_info.async =/= 0
 1710:     end,
 1711:     unlink(Tok),
 1712:     exit(Tok, bang),
 1713:     ok.
 1714: 
 1715: suspend_count(Suspendee) ->
 1716:     suspend_count(self(), Suspendee).
 1717: 
 1718: suspend_count(Suspender, Suspendee) ->
 1719:     {suspending, SList} = process_info(Suspender, suspending),
 1720: 
 1721:     case lists:keysearch(Suspendee, 1, SList) of
 1722:         {value, {_Suspendee, 0, 0}} ->
 1723:             ct:fail({bad_suspendee_list, SList});
 1724:         {value, {Suspendee, Count, 0}} when is_integer(Count), Count > 0 ->
 1725:             {status, suspended} = process_info(Suspendee, status),
 1726:             Count;
 1727:         {value, {Suspendee, 0, Outstanding}} when is_integer(Outstanding),
 1728:                                                   Outstanding > 0 ->
 1729:             0;
 1730:         false ->
 1731:             0;
 1732:         Error ->
 1733:             ct:fail({bad_suspendee_list, Error, SList})
 1734:     end.
 1735: 
 1736: repeat_acc(Fun, N, Acc) ->
 1737:     repeat_acc(Fun, 0, N, Acc).
 1738: 
 1739: repeat_acc(_Fun, N, N, Acc) ->
 1740:     Acc;
 1741: repeat_acc(Fun, N, M, Acc) ->
 1742:     repeat_acc(Fun, N+1, M, Fun(N, Acc)).
 1743: 
 1744: %% Tests that waiting process can be suspended
 1745: %% (bug in R2D and earlier; see OTP-1488).
 1746: 
 1747: %% Test that a waiting process can be suspended.
 1748: suspend_waiting(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1749:     Process = fun_spawn(fun process/0),
 1750:     receive after 1 -> ok end,
 1751:     true = erlang:suspend_process(Process),
 1752:     {status, suspended} = process_info(Process, status),
 1753:     ok.
 1754: 
 1755: 
 1756: %% Test that trace(new, true, ...) is cleared when tracer dies.
 1757: new_clear(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1758:     Tracer = proplists:get_value(receiver, Config),
 1759: 
 1760:     0 = erlang_trace(new, true, [send, {tracer, Tracer}]),
 1761:     {flags, [send]} = erlang_trace_info(new, flags),
 1762:     {tracer, Tracer} = erlang_trace_info(new, tracer),
 1763:     Mref = erlang:monitor(process, Tracer),
 1764:     true = exit(Tracer, done),
 1765:     receive
 1766:         {'DOWN',Mref,_,_,_} -> ok
 1767:     end,
 1768:     {flags, []} = erlang_trace_info(new, flags),
 1769:     {tracer, []} = erlang_trace_info(new, tracer),
 1770:     ok.
 1771: 
 1772: 
 1773: 
 1774: %% Test that trace(all, false, ...) works without tracer.
 1775: existing_clear(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1776:     Self = self(),
 1777: 
 1778:     Tracer = proplists:get_value(receiver, Config),
 1779:     N = erlang_trace(existing, true, [send, {tracer, Tracer}]),
 1780:     {flags, [send]} = erlang_trace_info(Self, flags),
 1781:     {tracer, Tracer} = erlang_trace_info(Self, tracer),
 1782:     M = erlang_trace(all, false, [all]),
 1783:     io:format("Started trace on ~p processes and stopped on ~p~n", 
 1784:               [N, M]),
 1785:     {flags, []} = erlang_trace_info(Self, flags),
 1786:     {tracer, []} = erlang_trace_info(Self, tracer),
 1787:     M = N, % Used to be N + 1, but from 19.0 the tracer is also traced
 1788: 
 1789:     ok.
 1790: 
 1791: %% Test that erlang:trace/3 can be called on processes where the
 1792: %% tracer has died. OTP-13928
 1793: tracer_die(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1794:     Proc = spawn_link(fun receiver/0),
 1795: 
 1796:     Tracer = spawn_link(fun receiver/0),
 1797:     timer:sleep(1),
 1798:     N = erlang_trace(existing, true, [send, {tracer, Tracer}]),
 1799:     {flags, [send]} = erlang_trace_info(Proc, flags),
 1800:     {tracer, Tracer} = erlang_trace_info(Proc, tracer),
 1801:     unlink(Tracer),
 1802:     exit(Tracer, die),
 1803: 
 1804:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun receiver/0),
 1805:     timer:sleep(1),
 1806:     N = erlang_trace(existing, true, [send, {tracer, Tracer2}]),
 1807:     {flags, [send]} = erlang_trace_info(Proc, flags),
 1808:     {tracer, Tracer2} = erlang_trace_info(Proc, tracer),
 1809:     unlink(Tracer2),
 1810:     exit(Tracer2, die),
 1811: 
 1812:     Tracer3 = spawn_link(fun receiver/0),
 1813:     timer:sleep(1),
 1814:     1 = erlang_trace(Proc, true, [send, {tracer, Tracer3}]),
 1815:     {flags, [send]} = erlang_trace_info(Proc, flags),
 1816:     {tracer, Tracer3} = erlang_trace_info(Proc, tracer),
 1817:     unlink(Tracer3),
 1818:     exit(Tracer3, die),
 1819: 
 1820:     ok.
 1821: 
 1822: %% Test that an invalid flag cause badarg
 1823: bad_flag(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1824:     %% A bad flag could deadlock the SMP emulator in erts-5.5
 1825:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = (catch erlang_trace(new,
 1826:                                                 true,
 1827:                                                 [not_a_valid_flag])),
 1828: 
 1829:     %% Leaks of {tracer,_} in OTP 23.2
 1830:     Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive die -> ok end end),
 1831:     1 = erlang_trace(Pid, true, [{tracer, self()},
 1832:                                  {tracer, self()}]),
 1833:     Pid ! die,
 1834:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} =
 1835:         (catch erlang_trace(new, true, [{tracer, self()}
 1836:                                         | improper])),
 1837:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} =
 1838:         (catch erlang_trace(new, true, [{tracer, self()},
 1839:                                         not_a_valid_flag])),
 1840:     ok.
 1841: 
 1842: %% Test erlang:trace_delivered/1
 1843: trace_delivered(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1844:     ct:timetrap({minutes, 1}),
 1845:     TokLoops = 10000,
 1846:     Go = make_ref(),
 1847:     Parent = self(),
 1848:     Tok = spawn(fun () ->
 1849:                         receive Go -> gone end,
 1850:                         tok_trace_loop(Parent, 0, TokLoops)
 1851:                 end),
 1852:     1 = erlang_trace(Tok, true, [procs]),
 1853:     Mon = erlang:monitor(process, Tok),
 1854:     NoOfTraceMessages = 4*TokLoops + 1,
 1855:     io:format("Expect a total of ~p trace messages~n",
 1856:               [NoOfTraceMessages]),
 1857:     Tok ! Go,
 1858:     NoOfTraceMessages = drop_trace_until_down(Tok, Mon),
 1859:     receive
 1860:         Msg ->
 1861:             ct:fail({unexpected_message, Msg})
 1862:     after 1000 ->
 1863:               ok
 1864:     end.
 1865: 
 1866: %% This testcase checks that receive trace works on exit signal messages
 1867: %% when the sender of the exit signal is the process itself.
 1868: trap_exit_self_receive(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1869:     Parent = self(),
 1870:     Proc = spawn_link(fun() -> process(Parent) end),
 1871: 
 1872:     1 = erlang_trace(Proc, true, ['receive']),
 1873:     Proc ! {trap_exit_please, true},
 1874:     {trace, Proc, 'receive', {trap_exit_please, true}} = receive_first_trace(),
 1875: 
 1876:     %% Make the process call exit(self(), signal)
 1877:     Reason1 = make_ref(),
 1878:     Proc ! {exit_signal_please, Reason1},
 1879:     {trace, Proc, 'receive', {exit_signal_please, Reason1}} = receive_first_trace(),
 1880:     {trace, Proc, 'receive', {'EXIT', Proc, Reason1}} = receive_first_trace(),
 1881:     receive {Proc, {'EXIT', Proc, Reason1}} -> ok end,
 1882:     receive_nothing(),
 1883: 
 1884:     unlink(Proc),
 1885:     Reason2 = make_ref(),
 1886:     Proc ! {exit_please, Reason2},
 1887:     {trace, Proc, 'receive', {exit_please, Reason2}} = receive_first_trace(),
 1888:     receive_nothing(),
 1889:     ok.
 1890: 
 1891: trace_info_badarg(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1892:     catch erlang_trace_info({a,b,c},d),
 1893:     ok.
 1894: 
 1895: %% An incoming suspend monitor down wasn't handled
 1896: %% correct when the local monitor half had been
 1897: %% removed with an emulator crash as result.
 1898: erl_704(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1899:     erl_704_test(100).
 1900: 
 1901: erl_704_test(0) ->
 1902:     ok;
 1903: erl_704_test(N) ->
 1904:     P = spawn(fun () -> receive infinity -> ok end end),
 1905:     erlang:suspend_process(P),
 1906:     exit(P, kill),
 1907:     (catch erlang:resume_process(P)),
 1908:     erl_704_test(N-1).
 1909: 
 1910: ms_excessive_nesting(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1911:     MkMSCond = fun (_Fun, N) when N < 0 -> true;
 1912:                    (Fun, N) -> {'or', {'=:=', N, '$1'}, Fun(Fun, N-1)}
 1913:                end,
 1914:     %% Ensure it compiles with substantial but reasonable
 1915:     %% (hmm...) nesting
 1916:     MS = [{['$1'], [MkMSCond(MkMSCond, 100)], []}],
